channel.title: Pause game while saving unable to un-pause
channel.description: I think the titole says all, if I press quicksave and straight away esc twice the game will go in pause but I'm unable to unpause, luckly does save.

item.title: Pause game while saving unable to un-pause
item.dc:creator: RedEye9
item.description:
Revert to the old ui/menu

Right-click the game in Steam, select “Properties”, and in the General tab select “Set Launch Options”. Type “-oldgameui” in the launch config.

Read full topic
item.source: Pause game while saving unable to un-pause

item.title: Pause game while saving unable to un-pause
item.dc:creator: emuboy
item.description:
I think the titole says all, if I press quicksave and straight away esc twice the game will go in pause but I’m unable to unpause, luckly does save.
